targets.rawSql:
SELECT ("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS "time",
(
  abs( extract( second from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") )
 + extract( minute from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60
 + extract( hour from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60
 + extract( day from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60 * 24)
) AS "Duration",
(SELECT "Name" AS "Robot" FROM public."Robots" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."RobotId")),
(SELECT "Disabled" FROM public."Robots" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."RobotId"))
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours')

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "Success"
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AND "Success" = true

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "Fail"
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AND "Success" = false

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "In progress"
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AND "Success" IS NULL

SELECT ("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS "time", "Success" AS ".",
(SELECT "Name" AS "Project" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId")),
(SELECT "Disabled" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId"))
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AND "Success" = true

SELECT ("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS "time",
(
  abs( extract( second from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") )
 + extract( minute from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60
 + extract( hour from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60
 + extract( day from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60 * 24)
) AS "Duration",
(SELECT "Name" AS "Project" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId")),
(SELECT "Disabled" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId"))
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours')

SELECT ("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS "time", "Success" AS ".",
(SELECT "Name" AS "Project" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId")),
(SELECT "Disabled" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId"))
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AND "Success" != true

SELECT ("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS "time",
(
  abs( extract( second from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") )
 + extract( minute from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60
 + extract( hour from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60
 + extract( day from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60 * 24)
) AS "Duration",
(SELECT "Name" AS "Project" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId")),
(SELECT "Disabled" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE ("Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId"))
FROM
  public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours')

SELECT
(SELECT "Name" AS "Robot" FROM public."Robots" WHERE "Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."RobotId"),
(SELECT "Name" AS "Project" FROM public."RpaProjects" WHERE "Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."ProjectId"),
(SELECT "Name" AS "Assignment" FROM public."Assignments" WHERE "Id" = public."RpaProjectLaunches"."AssignmentId"),
("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours') AS startedAt, (
  abs( extract( second from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") )
 + extract( minute from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60
 + extract( hour from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60
 + extract( day from ("CompletedAt" - "StartedAt") ) * 60 * 60 * 24)
) AS "Duration", "Success"
FROM public."RpaProjectLaunches"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(("StartedAt" - interval '3 hours'))
ORDER BY "StartedAt" DESC

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "Deleted" FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "ExchangeQueueId" = (
  SELECT "ExchangeQueueId" FROM "ExchangeQueues"
  WHERE "Name" = 'Queue1'
) 
AND "DeletedAt" IS NOT null

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "New" FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "ExchangeQueueId" = (
  SELECT "ExchangeQueueId" FROM "ExchangeQueues"
  WHERE "Name" = 'Queue1'
) 
AND "DeletedAt" IS null
AND "LastEventId" IS null

SELECT COUNT (*) AS "Readed" FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "ExchangeQueueId" = (
  SELECT "ExchangeQueueId" FROM "ExchangeQueues"
  WHERE "Name" = 'Queue1'
) 
AND "DeletedAt" IS null
AND "LastEventId" IS NOT null

SELECT "ExchangeQueueId", COUNT ("ExchangeQueueId") AS "New"
FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "LastEventId" IS NULL AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL
GROUP BY "ExchangeQueueId"

SELECT "ExchangeQueueId", COUNT ("ExchangeQueueId") AS "Readed"
FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "LastEventId" IS NOT NULL AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL
GROUP BY "ExchangeQueueId"

SELECT "ExchangeQueueId", COUNT ("ExchangeQueueId") AS "Deleted"
FROM "ExchangeQueueValues"
WHERE "LastEventId" IS NOT NULL AND "DeletedAt" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "ExchangeQueueId"
